column5: Does anyone know how to oil and grease the gears on a Quantum Smoke Spinning reel?  It spent 3 days in the rain and it seems to be sticking.  I've searched google and youtube with no luck on this specific reel.  Thanks
The only thing it came with was the schematics.
That's what you want when you take it apart and grease/oil it.
I was trying to avoid a complete dismantle. Several of my other reels have a single screw I can remove and add oil/grease through there...
Yeah eh? I guess Iâ€™ll be getting intimate with the reel instead of the girlfriend tonight lol  Are there any materials that I shouldnt use when trying to clean her up? Such as Q-Tips?
No WD-40 or anything that will break down the grease.  Q-Tips are fine.   Also don't over do it, a few drops is usually all that's needed.
There is a video on YouTube that may help you:    Regards, Snowball

Thanks, good advice.   Thanks Snowball, I had allready come upon this video, I did those basic mantenance tips and it seemed to have made a difference. But the real test will be when I put it through 8 hours of fishing lol
